entry.title: Tuesday: Mainly cloudy. High plus 2.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Wind becoming north 30 km/h gusting to 50 late this afternoon. High plus 2. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM CST Tuesday 14 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 22. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 22. Wind chill minus 9 this evening and minus 32 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:30 AM CST Tuesday 14 February 2023
